title: Brazilian Brigadeiro
author: Dincrivel

instructions.title: Mixing
instructions.content: In a pan, mix the condensed milk, chocolate powder, and butter.
note: Mix until it gets homogenous, you can start this and while it is getting good combine the next instruction

instructions.title: Heating
instructions.content: Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and starts to pull away from the bottom of the pan (about 10â€“15 minutes).
note: Don't stop stirring until it stops sticking to the bottom of the pan

instructions.title: Letting cool
instructions.content: Remove from heat an let it cool
note: So it don't burns your mouth

notes: Add some toppings, alone still amazing but why don't try to improve it: milk powder, chocolate sprinkles or oreos are my top 3
